Address.description: The address of the appraisal item.

AppraisalId.description: The appraisal associated with the appraisal item.

AppraisedById.description: The contact or the user that appraises the item.

ConditionType.description: Specifies the condition of the item that is appraised.

CustomerAskingValue.description: The value of the item proposed by the customer for the appraisal.

ExteriorColor.description: The exterior color of the item that is appraised.

FinalValue.description: The final value of the appraisal item.

IdentificationNumber.description: The identification number of the item that is appraised.

InitialValue.description: The preliminary value for the appraisal based on provider estimates.

InstallDate.description: The date that the item is installed.

IsAddOnIncluded.description: Indicates whether the item includes an add on (true) or not (false).

IsCustomized.description: Indicates whether the item is customized (true) or not (false).

IsHandoverComplete.description: Indicates whether the handover is complete for the appraisal item (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

LicensePlateNumber.description: The license plate number of the vehicle that is appraised.

MakeName.description: Specifies the make name of the item that is appraised.

ManufacturedDate.description: The date that the item is manufactured.

ModelName.description: Specifies the model of the item that is appraised.

ModelYear.description: Specifies the year when the model of the item is first launched.

OwnershipType.description: Specifies the type of ownership of the item.

PurchaseDate.description: The date that the item is purchased.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The existing record of the item related to the appraisal as referenced in the application, such as an Asset or Vehicle record with a serial number or a vehicle identification number.

RegistrationState.description: The state where the item that is appraised is registered.

RegistrationZipCode.description: The ZIP code of the item that is appraised.

TotalAdjustmentValue.description: The cumulative value based on all appraisal adjustments that refer to this appraisal item.

Trim.description: The trim levels supported by the item that is appraised.

Type.description: Specifies the type of item that forms the basis for the appraisal.

Usage.description: The usage of the item that is appraised.

UsageUnitOfMeasureId.description: The unit of measure for the usage.

WarrantyEndDate.description: The end date of the warranty of the item that is appraised.
